thread.title: Win A Gas Monkey Garage Chevy Camaro At Soboba Casino
thread.title_full: Win A Gas Monkey Garage Chevy Camaro At Soboba Casino - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Win A Gas Monkey Garage Chevy Camaro At Soboba Casino
text:
Soboba Casino
SAN JACINTO, Calif. , Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Soboba Casino slots are going full throttle! With a max bet of only 180 pennies ($1.80) someone could be taking home a brand new 2015 Chevy Camaro, customized by the world-famous Dallas, Texas crew at Gas Monkey Garage and personally signed by the star of Discovery Channel's hit TV show Fast N' Loud, Richard Rawlings !
According to Soboba Casino's Director of Slots, Joe Whitman , "No casino in the country or the world has ever offered a custom Gas Monkey Garage car as a top-line jackpot on a bank of their slots, and no one has ever taken home a custom Gas Monkey Garage Chevy Camaro on a $1.80 bet, YET!" Joe continued, "We are thrilled to be the first to offer this cool custom car on a bank of our hot penny slots."
Inside Soboba Casino's Cedar Room, one of ten penny slot machines will hold the keys to the custom Chevy Camaro Jackpot , valued at over $47,000 . The custom car can be won by playing several slot themes including 7x Pay, Double Gold, 3x Pay and Double Dollars. The slots are open for all guests to play to win, and the promotion will not end until the Camaro is driven home by one lucky winner.
Michael J. Broderick , director of marketing at Soboba Casino stated, "We won't rest until one of our players is behind the wheel of this Gas Monkey Garage Camaro."
During a meet and greet at Soboba Casino in August, Richard was seen signing the Camaro's dash board, just before shouting: "Get you some of that!"
In addition to the title, a certificate of authenticity will be provided to the lucky slot jackpot winner certifying the Camaro's provenance by the casino.
Gas Monkey Garage , located in Dallas Texas is a world-famous shop that has produced and shipped cars to people all over the world. The facility is now the focus of the Discovery Channel series Fast N' Loud .
Soboba Casino features approximately 2,000 of the newest, hottest slot machines, an expansive and modern non-smoking room, 20 classic gaming tables featuring all your favorite card games, and a large outdoor event arena which easily accommodates over 10,000 people. Need to recharge & refresh? Visit the cozy Soboba Cafe and Coffee Kiicha, or experience AC's Lounge with full cocktail bar and three giant HD flat screens including the "Sobobatron," the Inland Empire's biggest HD video wall.
Soboba Casino is proudly owned and operated by the Soboba Band of Luiseno Indians. Come join us for all the fun and then some! Soboba Casino. Where Everybody Goes to Play! For more information visit: soboba.com
